content: scholarly stripes by plucky knitter this bold eye-catching accessory is not only a pleasure to wear but a super simple knit as well with alternating bands of color you can make your hats in a classic combination or choose a more vibrant pairing of colors that is completely your own with 3 stripe styles to choose from you can get the most out of just 3 skeins of yarn specs & tools finished
